sentences.en: He became famous as an inventor of astonishing visual and aural effects.
sentences.cn: 他因创造了令人震撼的视听效果而出名。

sentences.en: Seven hierarchical exercises were designed to improve aural phonetic reception in these children.
sentences.cn: 七个层次练习是为了改善这些孩子的听觉语音接收能力。

sentences.en: Stories are voiced by trained dramatic actors for your aural appeal.
sentences.cn: 为你所需，这些故事由训练有素的剧场演员有声化。
